TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExtendedProtectionPolicyTypeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

remarks.para: The class is primarily used internally for XAML serialization of objects, and does not normally need to be used directly by most applications.

summary.para: The class represents the type converter for extended protection policy used by the server to validate incoming client connections.

remarks.para: Use the parameter to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked. This parameter can be null, so always check it. Also, properties on the object can return null.

summary.para: Convert the object to the specified type
